item.description:
Saturday, December 13, 2008



At our satellite sangha: the Southington Buddhist Fellowship



Our 3rd annual Holiday Party is a lot of fun. Let's celebrate all the holidays including Bodhi Day, which is the day of the historical Buddha's enlightenment 2,600 years ago.


We hope you can come. It's a pot luck party, alcohol free and with dancing. Includes $10 limit grab bag. Free of charge. Don't miss the fun and bring a friend. Open to new buddhists and visitors. See you then.


visit for more information. http://buddhistfaith....

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Holiday Party 2008 event
